summary:
Jorik is located in dawnstar- You will find him near the blacksmith 500 Gold and he is yours.

This is my first follower mod hope you like it! Starting December 26 i will be adding presents to Jorik's Inventory

He has nightingale armor and a spiecial weapon along with a few shouts! he will pick up a bow if not
descriptionHtml:
Jorik is located in dawnstar- You will find him near the blacksmith 500 Gold and he is yours.

He has nightingale armor and a special weapon along with a few shouts! he will pick up a bow if not provided.

If you want to read his backstory take his journal. This mod does not require any other mods. (can marry)


PM for any mod idea's ill make them if i can



Traits
--------
Race- Nord
Health- 800
Magicka- 2000
stamina- 100

Shouts
---------
Nightsfury
Disarm
Fire Breath
Frostbreath
Ice Form
Unrelenting Force
Winters Spite

Spells
--------
Muffle
Chill


Major Skills
--------------
Archery
Sneak
Speech
Light armor
Pick Pocket
Conjuration
LockPicking


Minor Skills
---------------
Illusion
Smithing
Enchanting
Restoration
One-Handed


Recomended mods
-------------------------

Stealth Kills for Followers - Standalone by flexcreator

Sneak Attack - Heartbeat sound effect by RowdyJoe

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLoki
author: angeloma
